doc.title: 3 Experimental Documentaries by Bill Brown
doc.plot: Three first person experimental documentaries that explore the landscapes of North America. Traveling along the Trans- Canada Highway, the backroads of North Dakota, and the U.S.-Mexico border, Brown considers geographies both outside his windshield and inside his head.
